definitions.title: vb. Pi., Hiph.
definitions.body: look (NH Pi. id.; Ar. nabat.a is well or issue forth (of water). As. nabâṭu is shine Dl:HWB 443; Sab. epith. [[נבט]] protector (? lit. looking with consideration upon Mordt:ZMG xxx. 1876:37); n. pr. [[נבטאל]] God has seen, i.e. considered Levy-Os:ZMG xix, 1865:231);—

fig.: sq. [[אֶל]] regard, shew regard to 1Sa 16:7 ([[אֶל־מַרְאֵהוּ]]), cf. 2Ki 3:14 (‖[[רָאָה]]); pay attention to, sq. [[אֶל־]] Is 22:8; = consider Is 51:1; Is 51:2; look unto ´[[י]], sq. [[אֶל־]] Ps 34:6 (read Imv. pl. LXX SyrVer Che), Is 22:11, Zec 12:10; cf. Ps 119:6 sq. [[אֶל־כָּל־מִחְוֹת]]; cf. also Job 36:25 (abs., sq. [[מֵרָחוֹק]]); sq. acc. [[אׂרְחׂתֶיְ]] Ps 119:15, cf. v:Ps 119:18, Is 5:12; sq. acc. [[אָוֶן]] Nu 23:2l (‖[[רָאָה]]); subj. [[עֵינִי]], ´[[וַתַּבֵּט בְּשׁוּרַי בְּ]] Ps 92:12 see its desire upon, gloat over (cf. [[רָאָה בְּ]]), diff. 1Sa 2:32; sq. acc. adv. Ps 142:5 ([[יׇמִין]] to the right; ‖[[רָאָה]]); abs. Is 42:18 (sq. [[לִרְאוֹךְ]] of purpose); Is 63:5 Hb Hab 1:5 (‖[[רָאָה]]), so Ps 91:8 ([[בְּעֵינֶיְ]]), cf. Pr 4:25, sq. [[לְנׁכַח]] (subj. [[עֵינֶיְ]]; ‖[[יַיְשִׁרוּ נֶגְדְֶָּ]]).
